Module: CGraphic.hpp Description: CGraphic class for handling PtGraphic widgets

Member Function Documentation

int CGraphic::setDashList ( char * dashList )
 

Sets the array of bytes that describes the on and off pixels of strokes

int CGraphic::setDashScale ( int dashScale )
 

A scaling factor that determines the size of the dashes. For information, see PgSetStrokeDash() in the Photon Library Reference.

int CGraphic::setPoints ( PhPoint_t * pointArray,
int numPoints )
 

Sets an array of points (PhPoint_t structures) describing the graphic.

int CGraphic::setInsideColor ( int insideColor )
 

Sets the inside color of the graphic widget. In Photon 1.14, this is identical with setFillColor(), but you should always use setInsideColor() to ensure compatibility to Photon 2.0
